name: cx.com
overview:
CX is a state of the art online service that provides secure storage, real-time syncing, public and private sharing, interactive group collaboration, and intelligent discovery. CX is where your content has a home, can be accessed on the go, can be shared with your friends or published online (you decide!). Want to discuss your content with a friend or a group of people? CX does that too with our groups and file commenting system.

Technology is supposed to free you, not chain you to the desk. With CX you can enjoy that freedom without having to leave behind the things you love.
